content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":134811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……僕、馬鹿も嫌いだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I also dislike idiots.\""},{"lineNumber":134812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、魔軍の攻撃が止んだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, the demon army's attack has stopped.\""},{"lineNumber":134813,"originalJapaneseLine":"　休憩だー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Time for a break!\""},{"lineNumber":134814,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの号令と共に、","translatedEnglishLine":"With Rance’s command,"},{"lineNumber":134815,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆が思い思いの場所に腰を下ろす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone sat down wherever they pleased."},{"lineNumber":134816,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うーん、分かっていたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm, I knew it,"},{"lineNumber":134817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵の攻撃がどんどん激しくなるな）","translatedEnglishLine":"the enemy attacks are getting more and more intense.)"},{"lineNumber":134818,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここまで来た仲間達、","translatedEnglishLine":"The companions who had come this far,"},{"lineNumber":134819,"originalJapaneseLine":"その誰もが疲労困憊の表情を浮かべていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"each bore faces showing utter exhaustion."},{"lineNumber":134820,"originalJapaneseLine":"中には気を失ったように眠る者までいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Among them were some who seemed to have lost consciousness, sleeping."},{"lineNumber":134821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":134822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ、なにしてるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Satera, what are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":134823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……見て分からないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Can't you tell by looking?"},{"lineNumber":134824,"originalJapaneseLine":"　新しいガーディアンを作ってるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm making a new Guardian.\""},{"lineNumber":134825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはいいが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's fine, but..."},{"lineNumber":134826,"originalJapaneseLine":"　休憩せんのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"aren't you going to rest?\""},{"lineNumber":134827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前も分かってるだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You understand too, right?"},{"lineNumber":134828,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はピンチなんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're in a pinch right now.\""},{"lineNumber":134829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら、その分サテラが頑張らないと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, all the more reason for you to do your best, Satera...\""},{"lineNumber":134830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふーん、無理しおって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph, pushing yourself too hard.\""},{"lineNumber":134831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":134832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか手伝ってやろうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Want me to help with something?\""},{"lineNumber":134833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No."},{"lineNumber":134834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というか触るな、邪魔になる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or rather, don't touch, you'll just get in the way.\""},{"lineNumber":134835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":134836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly..."},{"lineNumber":134837,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス、お前も無理するなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, don't overdo it either.\""},{"lineNumber":134838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「心配いらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't worry."},{"lineNumber":134839,"originalJapaneseLine":"　キツくなったら帰るわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it gets tough, I'll go back.\""},{"lineNumber":134840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、そうかも知れんがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, maybe so.\""},{"lineNumber":134841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前はサテラの使徒なんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're Satera's apostle."},{"lineNumber":134842,"originalJapaneseLine":"　使徒になる前に死ぬような間抜けだけはするな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just don't be a fool who dies before becoming an apostle.\""},{"lineNumber":134843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ、なんなら今、使徒になるか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right, do you want to become an apostle now?"},{"lineNumber":134844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　使徒になれば今より強くなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"If you become an apostle, you'd be stronger than now."},{"lineNumber":134845,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この戦いだってずっと楽に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"This battle would become much easier...\""},{"lineNumber":134846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「必要ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No need."},{"lineNumber":134847,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様は今の時点で最強だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm already the strongest at this point.\""},{"lineNumber":134848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":134849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I understand..."},{"lineNumber":134850,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラは話の分かる主だからな、","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is a lord who understands reason,"},{"lineNumber":134851,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の意思を尊重してやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I'll respect your will.\""},{"lineNumber":134852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただし、死んだら絶対に許さないからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, if you die, I absolutely won't forgive you."},{"lineNumber":134853,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけは忘れるな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't forget that.\""},{"lineNumber":134854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、はいはい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":134855,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が霧の濃い地帯を進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others advanced through the thick fog area."},{"lineNumber":134856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……霧がいい感じに姿を隠してくれてるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... The fog is hiding us nicely."},{"lineNumber":134857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この辺は敵も少なそうだし、","translatedEnglishLine":"There don't seem to be many enemies around here,"},{"lineNumber":134858,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しばらくは楽が出来そうだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so we might be able to take it easy for a while...\""},{"lineNumber":134859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No...\""},{"lineNumber":134860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、魔軍の攻撃が止んだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, the demon army's attack has stopped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆が思い思いの場所に腰を下ろす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone sat down wherever they pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の攻撃がどんどん激しくなるな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the enemy attacks are getting more and more intense.)
The companions who had come this far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その誰もが疲労困憊の表情を浮かべていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: each bore faces showing utter exhaustion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には気を失ったように眠る者までいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them were some who seemed to have lost consciousness, sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しいガーディアンを作ってるんだ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're in a pinch right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、その分サテラが頑張らないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, all the more reason for you to do your best, Satera..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか触るな、邪魔になる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, don't touch, you'll just get in the way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、お前も無理するなよ」
キツくなったら帰るわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it gets tough, I'll go back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前はサテラの使徒なんだ。
使徒になる前に死ぬような間抜けだけはするな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just don't be a fool who dies before becoming an apostle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、なんなら今、使徒になるか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, do you want to become an apostle now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒になれば今より強くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you become an apostle, you'd be stronger than now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いだってずっと楽に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle would become much easier..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は今の時点で最強だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm already the strongest at this point."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは話の分かる主だからな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is a lord who understands reason,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の意思を尊重してやる」
「ただし、死んだら絶対に許さないからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, if you die, I absolutely won't forgive you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が霧の濃い地帯を進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advanced through the thick fog area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう……霧がいい感じに姿を隠してくれてるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... The fog is hiding us nicely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺は敵も少なそうだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There don't seem to be many enemies around here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくは楽が出来そうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we might be able to take it easy for a while..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
